mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, nickname,phone, social, role, redate) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname},#{phone}, #{social}, #{role}, #{redate})
insert into member(id, pw, name, nickname, social, role, redate) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{social}, #{role}, #{redate})
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and social = #{social} Limit 1;
